mutants.original_line: return [s for s in strings if all(c in s for c in 'ABC')]
mutants.mutated_line: return [s for s in strings if all((c not in s for c in 'ABC'))]

mutants.original_line: return [s for s in strings if all(c in s for c in 'ABC')]
mutants.mutated_line: return [s for s in strings if all((c in s for c in ''))]
